languages.text: "Все могло решиться в пылу боя. Тем более здесь был Морт, он защищал бы Леди Теодору до последнего".

traits.locale_text: "Все могло решиться в пылу боя. Тем более здесь был Морт, он защищал бы Теодору до последнего".

languages.text: "It could have happened in the heat of battle. Not to mention that Mort was here, and he would have protected Lady Theodora to the last."
languages.original_text: "Все могло решиться в пылу боя. Тем более здесь был Морт, он защищал бы Леди Теодору до последнего".

traits.locale_text: "It could've happened in the heat of battle. Not to mention that Mort was here, and he would've protected Lady Theodora to the last."

"It could have happened in the heat of battle. Not to mention that Mort was here, and he would have protected Lady Theodora to the last."

languages.text: “如果战况很激烈，说不定也会发生这种事情。更何况，莫特也在这里。只要他在，他肯定会努力保护西奥多拉夫人，直到最后一刻。”
languages.original_text: "It could have happened in the heat of battle. Not to mention that Mort was here, and he would have protected Lady Theodora to the last."

traits.locale_text: “如果战况很激烈，说不定也会发生这种事情。更何况，莫特也在这里。只要他在，他肯定会努力保护西奥多拉夫人，直到最后一刻。”

languages.text: «Tal vez fuera durante el fragor de la batalla. Además, Mort estaba presente. Habría protegido a lady Theodora hasta el fin».
languages.original_text: "It could have happened in the heat of battle. Not to mention that Mort was here, and he would have protected Lady Theodora to the last."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez fuera durante el fragor de la batalla. Además, Mort estaba presente. Habría protegido a lady Theodora hasta el fin».

languages.text: 「激戦の中で起こったかもしれない。モートがここにいたことは言うまでもなく、彼なら最後までシオドーラ様を守っただろう。」
languages.original_text: "It could have happened in the heat of battle. Not to mention that Mort was here, and he would have protected Lady Theodora to the last."

traits.locale_text: 「激戦の中で起こったかもしれない。モルトがここにいたことは言うまでもなく、彼なら最後までレディ・テオドラを守っただろう。」
「激戦の中で起こったかもしれない。モートがここにいたことは言うまでもなく、彼なら最後までシオドーラ様を守っただろう。」

languages.text: « Ça aurait pu se produire dans le feu de l'action. Sans compter que Mort était là et qu'il aurait protégé dame Théodora jusqu'à son dernier souffle. »
languages.original_text: "It could have happened in the heat of battle. Not to mention that Mort was here, and he would have protected Lady Theodora to the last."

traits.locale_text: « Ça aurait pu se produire dans le feu de l'action. Sans compter que Mort était là et qu'il aurait protégé dame Théodora jusqu'à son dernier souffle. »

languages.text: "Vielleicht ist es im Eifer des Gefechts passiert. Immerhin war Mort anwesend, und er hätte Lady Theodora bis zum letzten Atemzug beschützt."
languages.original_text: "It could have happened in the heat of battle. Not to mention that Mort was here, and he would have protected Lady Theodora to the last."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht ist es im Eifer des Gefechts passiert. Immerhin war Mort anwesend, und er hätte Lady Theodora bis zum letzten Atemzug beschützt."

languages.original_text: "It could have happened in the heat of battle. Not to mention that Mort was here, and he would have protected Lady Theodora to the last."

languages.text: "Çatışmanın hararetinde olmuş olabilir. Ayrıca Mort da buradaydı, değil mi? Leydi Theodora'yı canı pahasına korurdu."
languages.original_text: "It could have happened in the heat of battle. Not to mention that Mort was here, and he would have protected Lady Theodora to the last."

traits.locale_text: "Çatışmanın hararetinde olmuş olabilir. Ayrıca Mort da buradaydı, değil mi? Leydi Theodora'yı canı pahasına korurdu."
